description: In the video, the Germany goalkeeper sings a Croatian song with nationalist lyrics.
title: Bayern's Manuel Neuer filmed singing Croatian nationalist song
title_page: Bayern's Manuel Neuer filmed singing Croatian nationalist song - BBC News
maintext: Critics have linked Mr Perkovic - known as Thompson after the type of machine gun he carried during Croatia's independence war in the 1990s - to the nationalism of Croatia's pro-Nazi Ustasha regime in World War Two.
